entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is introduced as a student who is almost always surrounded by a gang of giggling girls. She is mentioned to be on her own again, which is unusual for her.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who remembers the agony of trying to get Cho by herself to ask her to the Yule Ball.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as Cho's boyfriend who died. His death affected both Harry and Cho's holiday.

relationships.description: Harry remembers the agony of trying to get Cho by herself to ask her to the Yule Ball.
Cho was in a relationship with Cedric, who died.
